Container.Name: amtd
Container.Description: Automated Movie Trailer Downloader :: AMTD is a Radarr Companion script to automatically download movie trailers for use in media applications
Container.Overview: Automated Movie Trailer Downloader :: AMTD is a Radarr Companion script to automatically download movie trailers for use in media applications [br][br][b][span style='color: #E80000;']!!!Important!!![/span][/u] :: You must add a volume that matches your Radarr's volume mappings associated with Radarr's Library Root Folder settings[/b]

Config.Name: Enable Automatic Script Start
Config.Description: true = Enabled :: Runs script automatically on startup

Config.Name: Script Interval
Config.Description: #s or #m or #h or #d :: s = seconds, m = minutes, h = hours, d = days :: Amount of time between each script run, when AUTOSTART is enabled

Config.Name: Radarr Url
Config.Description: Set domain or IP to your Radarr instance including port. If using reverse proxy, do not use a trailing slash. Ensure you specify http/s...

Config.Name: Radarr Extras Type
Config.Description: all or trailers :: all downloads all available videos (trailers, clips, featurettes, etc...) :: trailers only downloads trailers

Config.Name: Radarr Trailer Format
Config.Description: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

Config.Name: Radarr Trailer Subtitle Langauge
Config.Description: Desired Language Code :: For guidence, please see youtube-dl documentation

Config.Name: Radarr Single Trailer
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Only downloads the first available trailer, does not apply to other extras type

Config.Name: Radarr Use Folders
Config.Description: true = enabled :: Creates subfolders within the movie folder for extras
